transcription: Hey, this is Todd Putnam, owner of Champion's Famous Fried Chicken here in Daphne, Alabama, Highway 98. We are a fried chicken restaurant specialized obviously in chicken, homemade Mississippi Delft hot tamales, blues music, and cold beer. We just like to do everything fresh, everything good, everything homemade, and have a nice atmosphere, and have a nice place to have a drink.  full bar, beer, everything to go with it. Here at Champions we have five beers on tap, anything from a pilsner to an IPA to our happy hour brews. We also have a full bar full of whiskey and gin and vodka and all kind of cocktails, whatever one might want.  You need me to help you? Good.
